Synopsis: 
Every year, the quiet town of Lake Victoria is disturbed his calm in the spring festival, which attracts thousands of young people everywhere to enjoy the sun, water ... and alcohol. But this year there will be another concern besides the usual hangovers and complaints from neighbors on terror is about to take over the lake. After an underground tremor free hundreds of prehistoric piranhas, a disparate group of strangers must band together to avoid ending up in the snack converts to the new and vicious inhabitants of the lake. 

Production notes: 
Piranha 3D is a three-dimensional remake of the cult film directed by Joe Dante and produced by Roger Corman in 1978 on a carnivorous piranha thrust into a resort.
